snippet: A police spokesman said the shooting occurred on Tuesday during a training exercise in Baltimore County. All training academy operations have been suspended.
abstract: Baltimore police commissioner suspends some training academy staff members after campus police trainee is accidentally shot in the head by an instructor.
lead_paragraph: A police spokesman said the shooting occurred on Tuesday during a training exercise in Baltimore County. All training academy operations have been suspended.

headline.main: Maryland: Police Trainee Is Shot by Instructor
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Police Trainee Is Shot By Instructor
